title: Friday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
BOB #89: Not Our Future

WARDOGS INC. #8: Heading Out

THE SWORD OF GOD #35: Little Shoppe of Horrors

CHATEAU GRIEF #173: Stabotage

SHADE #65: Neither Accident Nor Malfunction

Speaking of Arktoons, the crowdfund for MIDNIGHT’S WAR has been officially launched and is presently at 45 percent of goal with 88 backers over 50 percent with 99 backers. Check out the video there, and be sure to note that the way to obtain all three paperbacks/hardcovers is to back for the first one, then add-on the other two.
